text: Brickellia peninsularis is a Mexican species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is native to western Mexico in the states of Baja California, Baja California Sur, and Colima.Turner, B. L. 1997. The Comps of Mexico: A systematic account of the family Asteraceae, vol. 1 – Eupatorieae. Phytologia Memoirs 11: i–iv, 1–272Tropicos, Brickellia peninsularis Brandegee Brandegee, Townshend Stith 1903. Zoë 5: 160-161Jones, Marcus Eugene 1933. Contributions to Western Botany 18: 71 as Brickellia undonis ==References== peninsularis Category:Endemic flora of Mexico Category:Flora of Baja California Category:Flora of Baja California Sur Category:Flora of Colima Category:Plants described in 1903 Category:Taxa named by Townshend Stith Brandegee
title: Brickellia peninsularis
